name: Hatsune Miku VR / 初音ミク VR
description: World famous virtual singer Hatsune Miku invites you to her VR music game! Aim for the perfect score as she sings and dances to some of her most iconic songs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 - 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
